attributes.action: Any Government department who fail to respond to freedom information requests then that minister should resign
attributes.additional_details: Freedom of information requests made to the government are ignored and very often suffer serious delays in replies, an example of this is the seven month wait I have had to have my request dealth with and it is still outstanding.   I therefore think that a Government minister should be made to resign if they continually miss the deadlines for replying to Freedom of Information Requests.
